mechanics.condition: Target is touched AND (Target is a willing creature OR Target is a place OR Target is an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension)
mechanics.outcome: Target is hidden from divination magic for the duration

mechanics.trigger: Divination magic attempts to target a creature, place, or object
mechanics.condition: The creature, place, or object is under the effect of Nondetection
mechanics.outcome: The creature, place, or object cannot be targeted by divination magic

mechanics.trigger: Magical scrying sensor attempts to perceive a creature, place, or object
mechanics.condition: The creature, place, or object is under the effect of Nondetection
mechanics.outcome: The creature, place, or object cannot be perceived through magical scrying sensors

description_text: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic. The target can be a willing creature or a place or an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The target can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.
